import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete verification"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/verifications/{assetVerificationId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a single asset verification record. Use this to remove erroneous or duplicate verifications.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetVerificationId** - Obtain from existing verification query.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the verification to delete.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/verifications/\{assetVerificationId\}](/docs/api/assets/delete-asset-verification).

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetVerificationId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetVerificationId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the verification record to delete","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Verification deleted successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response returned after successfully deleting a resource. Contains the ID of the deleted item.","properties":{"Id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the deleted resource"},"UserToken":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Authenticated session identifier"},"RequestDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Timestamp when the API processed the request"},"ExecutionTime":{"type":"number","format":"double","description":"Server-side execution time in milliseconds"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code"},"Message":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional informational message"},"ServerName":{"type":"string","description":"Application node that processed the request"},"ProcessId":{"type":"integer","description":"Internal process identifier for diagnostics"},"OperationId":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Trace identifier for log correlation"}},"required":["Id","StatusCode"],"title":"ItemDeleteResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Verification not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
